summary.span: 提供 DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構內的單一選項。

span.span: Provides a single choice within a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是類似於[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目。This class is analogous to the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. 選擇測試的順序出現於[ \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)項目。Choices are tested in the order that they appear within a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element. 如果您指定屬性``項目，其值必須是裝置篩選條件中所定義的名稱``Machine.config 檔案的區段。If you specify the property of the `` element, its value must be the name of a device filter defined in the `` section of the Machine.config file. 在執行階段，ASP.NET 會評估指定的裝置篩選條件，針對目前裝置的功能。At run time, ASP.NET evaluates the specified device filter against the capabilities of the current device. 如果成功的話，會選取該選項。If successful, the choice is selected. 如果您未指定屬性，則會預設為``選取項目。If you do not specify the property, the defaults for the `` element are selected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範``映像中的項目。The following code example shows a `` element within an image. `Source`屬性覆寫屬性控制項。The `Source` attribute overrides the property of the control. 雖然這個範例會使用函式判斷瀏覽器是否需要 WML (`isWML11`) 或支援色彩 (`supportsColor`)，您可以改用 Web.config 檔案來定義``項目，將會自動使用.NET Framework為您的決定。Although the example uses functions to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`) or supports color (`supportsColor`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a `` element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 頁面語法概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果篩選是比較篩選條件的值來取代在 Web.config 中定義的引數值。如果值是方法的名稱 (在頁面或關閉 Web.config 所指組件中) 的值該方法的引數的形式提供。If the filter is a comparison filter, the value of is used in place of the argument value defined in Web.config. If the value of is the name of a method (either on the page or off in an assembly pointed to by Web.config), the value of is supplied as an argument to that method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理覆寫的屬性之後，變更此集合 (在方法) 沒有任何作用。Changing this collection after overridden properties have been processed (in the method) has no effect. 這個方法主要由控制項設計工具使用，並不是一般用途。This method is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general use.

summary.span: 取得或設定裝置篩選條件的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a device filter.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

The name of a device filter.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選器名稱必須是在頁面上，在相關聯的方法名稱`.ascx`中定義的檔案或有效的裝置篩選器名稱 <`deviceFilters`> Web.config 區段。如果您指定方法名稱屬性，方法必須符合下列的原型。The filter name must be the name of a method on the page, in the associated `.ascx` file, or the name of a valid device filter defined in the <`deviceFilters`> section of Web.config. If a method name is specified with the property, that method must match the following prototype. ``` public bool methodName(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument) ``` 例如，如果屬性設定為`myChoiceMethod`，具有下列簽章的方法必須存在。For example, if the property was set to `myChoiceMethod`, a method with the following signature must exist. ``` public bool myChoiceMethod(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument); ``` 評估時[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目，會進行檢查以判斷頁面上是否有適當的簽章的方法。When evaluating the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element, a check is made to determine whether a method of the appropriate signature exists on the page. 如果沒有，ASP.NET 檢查 <`deviceFilters`> Web.config 區段。If not, ASP.NET checks the <`deviceFilters`> section of Web.config. > [!NOTE] > 裝置篩選條件會區分大小寫。Device filters are case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性主要由控制項設計工具使用，不適用於一般開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general developer use. 從包含的控制項或頁面繼承值。The value is inherited from the containing control or page.
